label: 預所
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: a high-level estate supervisor who represented the proprietor’s interests. The custodian was sometimes an aristocrat who carried out his or her duties in the capital, and sometimes a warrior, monk, or local elite who lived on the estate.
